about_the_game:
In a galaxy far, far away… Use futuristic titles to describe the distant planets you discovered during your mission. Record geodata and collect information about cosmic objects. Use backgrounds and space titles to describe your journey.

In this set you'll find:

  • 6 titles
  • 6 stickers
  • 5 backgrounds
  • 2 intros

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus 2020
detailed_description:
In a galaxy far, far away… Use futuristic titles to describe the distant planets you discovered during your mission. Record geodata and collect information about cosmic objects. Use backgrounds and space titles to describe your journey.

In this set you'll find:

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2020 - Video Editing Software

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2020 Effects - Space Journey Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2020 - Space Journey Pack - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Movavi Video Editor Plus 2020 Effects - Space Journey Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation

short_description: Per aspera ad astra! With this pack, you can explore remote planets and undiscovered satellites.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
